products.title: Luna Blackout Beige - Silver Frame Velux Keylite Fakro Dakstra
products.metadescription: Luna Blackout Beige - Silver Frame Velux Keylite Fakro Dakstra in Cream. Made to measure from £19.00 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Velux Keylite Fakro Dakstra includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our Luna Blackout roof blinds come in 8 colour options - a great way for you to upgrade your skylight window at a value cost. 
 
This option comes with sleek, modern aluminium framework. 
 
This fabric has an acrylic coating backing and provides up to 20% heat loss reduction.
 
 Product ID: DB-SRB0043 Fabric Colour: Beige Material: 100% Polyester Lining: White Backing Headrail: 53mm Deep Cassette & 30mm Wide Side Channels     Energy Saving Rating: ER3 - Highest Energy Saving Value - UV Protection and Effective Thermal Retention Blackout: Yes

products.title: Splash Beige - Light Filtering Velux Keylite Fakro Dakstra
products.metadescription: Splash Beige - Light Filtering Velux Keylite Fakro Dakstra in Cream. Made to measure from £34.52 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Velux Keylite Fakro Dakstra includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
The Splash Beige Light Filtering Skylight blind is a light, natural looking colour for your skylight window.  The blind comes with sleek, modern aluminium framework which is also available in a white colour.  Our Skylight blinds also have the option to include a control rod for those more difficult to reach windows.  As with all our made to measure products this blind will come with a 5 year guarantee for extra peace of mind. 
 
 
 
 Product ID: DB-SRB0057 Fabric Colour: Beige     Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Effective Thermal Retention Light Filtering: Yes

products.title: Vitra Blackout Beige Velux Keylite Fakro Dakstra
products.metadescription: Vitra Blackout Beige Velux Keylite Fakro Dakstra in Cream. Made to measure from £38.98 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Velux Keylite Fakro Dakstra includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Vitra Blackout is one of our most popular blackout fabrics.  In several fresh, bright shades, this fabric is a  great way for you to upgrade your skylight window at a value cost. 
 
This option comes with sleek, modern Aluminium framework. 
 
This blackout fabric has a colour match backing and provides up to 20% heat loss reduction.
 
 Product ID: DB-SRB0008 Fabric Colour: Beige Material: 100% Polyester Lining: Colour Match Backing - See Sample     Energy Saving Rating: ER3 - Highest Energy Saving Value - UV Protection and Effective Thermal Retention Blackout: Yes

products.title: Sprinkle Solar Hemp Pleated Skylight Blind
products.metadescription: Sprinkle Solar Hemp Pleated Skylight Blind in Yellow/Orange/Multicoloured. Made to measure from £40.94 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Pleated Skylight Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
A fun geometric-design, Sprinkle Solar comes in several shades.  Perfect for adding modern splashes of colour to your home.   Featuring an aluminium coated back, this fabric reflects heat in summer and retains heat in summer. A perfect thermal fabric.
 
 Product ID: DB-PLS0139 Fabric Colour: Hemp Material: 100% Polyester Headrail: White rails and hardware with pull down tab and visible guide wires to support the blind fabric.     Control Type: Pull down tab - 100cm reach rod available at extra cost Energy Saving Rating: ER3 - Highest Energy Saving Value - UV Protection and Effective Thermal Retention Light Filtering: Yes

products.title: Jasmine Solar Ice Pleated Skylight Blind
products.metadescription: Jasmine Solar Ice Pleated Skylight Blind in White. Made to measure from £40.94 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Pleated Skylight Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
A Solar Control fabric in four shades to both compliment your décor and provide solar protection.
 
 Product ID: DB-PLS0120 Fabric Colour: Ice Material: 100% Polyester Headrail: White rails and hardware with pull down tab and visible guide wires to support the blind fabric.     Control Type: Pull down tab - 100cm reach rod available at extra cost Energy Saving Rating: ER3 - Highest Energy Saving Value - UV Protection and Effective Thermal Retention Light Filtering: Yes

products.title: Infusion Solar Beige Pleated Skylight Blind
products.metadescription: Infusion Solar Beige Pleated Skylight Blind in Cream. Made to measure from £40.94 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Pleated Skylight Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our range of Infusion Solar pleated blinds is an excellent alternative to a Venetian or roller blind. The Solar feature means the blind will block sunlight and ultraviolet rays.  
 The Infusion Solar Beige pleated skylight blind will transform the look of your home. Ideal for sloping windows, this beautiful blind is elegant and stylish. 
   
 
 Product ID: DB-PLS0008 Fabric Colour: Beige Headrail: White rails and hardware with pull down tab and visible guide wires to support the blind fabric.     Control Type: Pull down tab - 100cm reach rod available at extra cost Energy Saving Rating: ER3 - Highest Energy Saving Value - UV Protection and Effective Thermal Retention Light Filtering: Yes

products.metadescription: Calia Solar Flame Retardant Beige Pleated Skylight Blind in Cream. Made to measure from £40.94 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Pleated Skylight Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:

products.title: Light Beige (1085) (Blackout)
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure Light Beige (1085) (Blackout) Velux Blackout Roller Blinds from SoEasy Blinds. Order quality Velux Blackout Roller Blinds online today at low prices with fast UK delivery
products.productdescription:
The Velux blackout blind offers light proof seal for total darkness anytime. It is ideal in bedrooms, where you need complete light control to ensure a good nights sleep or restful nap during the day.

 	Total blackout - best on the market.
 	Oeko-Tex certified.
 	Stepless positioning.
 	Slim design integrates perfectly with your roof window.
 	Available in 24 colours.
 	Installs in minutes.

products.title: Classic Sand (1259)
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure Classic Sand (1259) Velux Pleated Blinds from SoEasy Blinds. Order quality Velux Pleated Blinds online today at low prices with fast UK delivery
products.productdescription:
The Velux pleated blind is an elegant way to provide privacy while bathing your room in a pleasant , soft light. It can be positioned anywhere in the roof window to adjust the amount of incoming light an you can still enjoy a view of he outside.

 	Softly diffuses incoming daylight.
 	Elegant, decorative lighting effect.
 	Flexible and stepless positioning.
 	Slim, elegant side rails and top case.
 	Installs in minutes.
 	20 different colours and designs.

products.title: Bombay Beige (6507)
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure Bombay Beige (6507) Velux Roman Blinds from SoEasy Blinds. Order quality Velux Roman Blinds online today at low prices with fast UK delivery
products.productdescription:

products.title: Beige (1155)
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure Beige (1155) Velux Energy Blinds from SoEasy Blinds. Order quality Velux Energy Blinds online today at low prices with fast UK delivery
products.productdescription:
The Velux energy blinds offers variable blackout and an insulation effect of up to 19%. The double-pleated blackout cloth has an aluminium honeycomb structure within for significantly improved insulation. Energy blinds are not fixed at the top of the bottom, so you can position them exactly where you need them for light control and privacy.

 	Blackout effect.
 	Flexible and stepless positioning.
 	Improved insulation.
 	Sleek design - no visible cords.
 	Installs in minutes.
 	12 colour choices.
